modName: Lute Replacer With Sound - Play and Bash compatible - Christmas Exclusive
summary: Replaces the lutes ingame with electric guitars.
descriptionHtml:
This mod replaces the ingame lutes (but they keep their item name) with electric guitars or fenders. This mod also replaces the existing lute songs with guitar songs performed by LaiYouttitham on Youtube.

It took me many attempts to line up the guitar as an animobject in NifSkope, but it turned out alright I guess.

Recommended mods:
Playable Instruments - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9375/? (Install that one before mine and click yes to overwrite)
Skyrim christmas music replacer - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48970'
Christmas Lanterns - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27845
Seasons of Skyrim Project (Winter edition) - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/46628/
And other Christmas-themed mods.

Known bugs:
I don't think the guitar meshes have any collision so they might fall through the floor when you drop them.

Credits:
Yukata for "The Fender Hammer" mod.
LaiYouttitham for the song replacers featured in this mod.
author: T3alrose and Yukata
